parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: Performs a tree ring (sunburst) or icicle layout on a tree. This involves assigning a sector region to each vertex in the tree, and placing that information in a data array with four components per tuple representing (innerRadius, outerRadius, startAngle, endAngle).

parameter.name: Reference
parameter.defaultValue:
Stasko, John, Catrambone, Richard, Guzdial, Mark and McDonald, Kevin, An Evaluation of Space-Filling Information Visualizations for Depicting Hierarchical Structures, International Journal of Human-Computer Studies, Vol. 53, No. 5, November 2000, pp. 663-694.
Stasko, John T. and Zhang, Eugene, Focus+Context Display and Navigation Techniques for Enhancing Radial, Space-Filling Hierarchy Visualizations, Proceedings of IEEE Information Visualization 2000, Salt Lake City, UT, October 2000, pp. 57-65.
